short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension sets your search engine to blogoinfo and customizes your new tab page so you can use it with every search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets your search engine to Blogoinfo and customizes your new tab page so you can use it with every search.

This extension sets Blogoinfo as your default search engine which allowing you to search directly from the address bar of your browser. It also customizes your new tab page. Give it a try!
